description.narrative: Output 8.2: UNICEF field offices have increased capacity to efficiently and effectively plan, coordinate and deliver humanitarian and development programmes, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Output 7.1 :By 2022, UNICEF, Government and key humanitarian partners effectively analyse, prepare and coordinate emergency response to children and families at risk and in humanitarian situations, especially those most vulnerable

title.narrative: Yemen United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Yemen Country Programme Document 2012-2022 Results Matrix
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Yemen 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 8.2: UNICEF field offices have increased capacity to efficiently and effectively plan, coordinate and deliver humanitarian and development programmes
